headline: More Troops  Added to List Of Injured  In Iraq Attack
abstract: The number, which has steadily increased since the Jan. 8 attack, is now at 64.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON â€” The Defense Department said on Thursday that 64 troops had sustained traumatic brain injuries after the Iranian ballistic missile strikes on Ayn Al Asad Air Base in Iraq this month, up 14 from an earlier announcement this week.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
